QuestData.Title: Making the Connection
QuestData.Description: A communication crystal! Have they survived this long?$b$bWe used to use these to communicate. They allowed us to project images of ourselves to other nearby crystals to see and speak with those on the other end.$b$b<Thalyssra examines the crystal for a few moments.>$b$bThe magic has long since depleted from the crystal. We will need a power source, preferably something just as old as this.$b$bCheck our surroundings, but be careful. It is too quiet out here....
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the ruins of Kal'methir for magical relics.
